backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profiles, multi-currency deposit transactions (9 African currencies), winning records, access control with admin/user permissions, and balance management with M-PESA paybill 400004.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old deposit transactions (single currency) to new multi-currency format, defaulting existing transactions to KES and updating paybill to 400004.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implementation of pan-African phone validation, currency selection for deposits, and multi-currency support across frontend components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components including profile management, deposit interface with 9 African currencies, phone verification for 16 African countries, and admin functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH color system defining Betika green theme colors and CSS variables for light/dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Betika Casino application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for profile, admin pages, and global Toaster component.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Access denied screen with Internet Identity login button displayed to unauthenticated users attempting to access protected content.
frontend/src/components/AdminFundsReleas: Admin interface for viewing pending winner payouts and releasing winnings with confirmation dialog, showing user details, amounts in KSh, and win dates.
frontend/src/components/BalanceCard.tsx: Displays user account balance in KSh with a wallet icon in a gradient green card. Formats bigint balance values with locale-specific number formatting.
frontend/src/components/BettingHistorySe: Shows betting history with summary cards (total staked, won, net profit) and a data table of recent bets. Uses mock data for game types, stakes, outcomes, and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/DataTable.tsx: Generic reusable table component that renders data with configurable columns and optional formatting functions. Displays empty state when no data is available.
frontend/src/components/DepositSection.t: Handles multi-currency deposits with M-PESA integration, showing paybill/account details and exchange rate calculations. Supports 9 currencies (KES, USD, EUR, GBP, UGX, TZS, MWK, ZAR, ZMW) with conversion to KES.
Displays total registered member count in a gradient green card with loading skeleton and error handling. Fetches data using useGetTotalMemberCount hook.
frontend/src/components/PersonalInfoSect: Displays user profile information (username, email, wallet address, member since date) in a card with icons. Shows empty state when no profile data is available.
frontend/src/components/PhoneVerificatio: Modal for 6-digit SMS verification code entry with resend functionality and countdown timer. Handles phone verification and resend mutations with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/ProfileHeader.ts: Profile page header with banner background, avatar, user info, balance card, and action buttons (admin access if authorized, logout). Uses gradient overlay and responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal component for initial user profile setup that collects username, email, wallet address, and phone number with real-time African phone number validation and triggers phone verification flow upon submission.
frontend/src/components/ProfileTabs.tsx: Tabbed interface component that organizes profile sections (Personal Info, Deposit, Betting History, Transactions, Settings) with responsive icons and labels.
Settings form component that allows users to update their username, email, and wallet address with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/TransactionHisto: Displays transaction history in a data table with support for deposits, withdrawals, and winnings, showing original currency amounts and KES equivalents with payment method details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend operations including user profile management, deposit initiation/confirmation, member count retrieval, phone verification, and admin fund release with mock implementations for some features.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, including Betika green brand colors and utility classes for styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page with access control, displaying fund release management interface, summary cards, and release history table for authorized administrators.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile page that handles authentication, profile setup, phone verification, and displays user profile information with tabs and member count.
frontend/src/utils/phoneValidation.ts: Pan-African phone number validation utilities supporting 16+ African countries with carrier detection, country detection, and phone number formatting functions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: URL parameter parsing utilities for extracting, storing, and managing query parameters from both regular and hash-based routing with sessionStorage persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom colors (including Betika green theme), container settings, animations, and extended theme properties using OKLCH color space.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking a BETIKA-like betting/casino app with phone authentication, M-PESA payments (paybill 400004), multi-currency support, and user profile features. Contains 24 existing features including phone verification, payment deposits/withdrawals, user registration analytics, and pan-African phone number validation.
